description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address upgrade challenges with Windows Server 2012 R2:

1. Begin by assessing whether the server meets the hardware requirements for an upgrade.
2. Consider performing an in-place upgrade to a newer version of Windows Server. Refer to the following resources for detailed guidance:
   - [Upgrade Overview](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/upgrade-overview)  
   - [In-place Upgrade Instructions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/perform-in-place-upgrade)  

**Details**:
Ensure to have backups and a recovery plan in case the upgrade process encounters issues. Testing the upgrade process in a lab environment can also be beneficial.
